title: Wednesday briefing: How Britain’s asylum debate is shifting further to the right

title: Attempt to partner African countries with Japanese cities triggers xenophobic backlash
summary: Cities in Japan are facing thousands of complaints related to a new scheme aimed at strengthening community connections. Many residents are confused about the program's intent and implementation. As a result, local authorities are working to address the misunderstandings and improve communication.
